title: What is the interpretation of seeing a Christian convert to Islam in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you a complete interpretation of a Christian vision of Islam in a dream, and this vision can indicate adherence to religion and faith in God Almighty, as well as removing worries and disagreements that arise, and fixing future circumstances. For the viewer. What the fortuneteller will do in his next life and also in marrying a girl and marrying a handsome man, both of which are good marriages and obedience to God and parents. Interpretation of Ibn Shirin who sees in a dream a Christian converting to Islam. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that a Christian in his dream converted to Islam. This vision can indicate happiness and faith in Almighty God. Also, seeing a Christian who has fully embraced Islam in a dream may indicate the coming collapse of the dreamer’s fears, his enormous power, and his many gains, and God knows best. Also, seeing a Christian who has completely embraced Islam in a dream may indicate his devotion to God Almighty. And God Almighty, as well as the dreamer entering a new job, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision of a Christian converting to Islam in a dream of a woman praying. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a completely Christian stranger, this portends the death of the dreamer’s upcoming worries and the abundance of happiness and pleasure. Also, seeing a Christian converting to Islam in a dream The girl indicates increased joy and life in her work and a close marriage to a good person. Also, seeing a Christian converting to Islam in a girl’s dream indicates the superiority and brilliant success that he will achieve in his next life, and God knows best. Seeing a Christian converting to Islam in a dream, with a girl, may indicate To her proximity to happiness, many family joys, as well as recovery from illness. What is the interpretation of a Christian’s vision of Islam for a married woman? If a married woman sees in her dream the apostasy of her Christian marriage, this indicates her commitment to religion and her repentance from all sins and disobedience. Also, seeing a Christian converting to Islam In a married woman’s dream, her death indicates her future worries and problems, as well as happiness, pleasure, and joy. Also, seeing a Christian who has fully converted to Islam in a dream may indicate that a married woman is pregnant with a child of good offspring, as well as the death of her marital disputes. A dream about a Christian convert to Islam may indicate Islam in A dream about a married woman indicates that her husband will get a new and rewarding job and also that she will achieve her future goals. What is the interpretation of a Christian’s vision of Islam for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees in her dream a Christian and then converts to Islam, this indicates that her worries will go away and her future life will become easier, I swear to God I know. Also, seeing a Christian woman converting to Islam in a complete dream may indicate that she is soon approaching her due date, as well as the ease of giving birth to a healthy child. What is the interpretation of a Christian’s vision of Islam for a man? Interpretation of a dream: A Christian converted to Islam in a complete dream, and this vision indicates the death of his worries and his repentance. Of sins, disobedience and immorality. Also, to see in a dream a complete Christian converting to Islam may indicate that the man will join a new, good and famous job, and it also indicates happiness. Also, to see a Christian converting to Islam in a dream of a nice man may indicate

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a snake, according to Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake: It raises confusion and questions about what it shows to dreamers and makes them very keen to know about it. In the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic in an easy way, so let us read below. Interpretation of a dream about a snake: Seeing a snake in a dream means that he is surrounded by many people who do not like him at all and wish He has illness. If a person sees a snake in his dream, this is a sign of the many problems he suffers from in his life that prevent him from feeling comfortable. If the dreamer sees a snake in his sleep, this greatly indicates the deterioration of his psychological state as a result of the many worries that surround him. The dreamer’s vision of a snake in his home symbolizes the many disagreements prevailing in his relationship with his family, which makes relations between them very tense. Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dreamer’s vision of a snake in a dream as a sign of the presence of someone close to him who has malicious intentions towards him. He must be careful to be safe from its evil. If a person sees a snake in his house in his dream, this indicates that his worst enemies are among those close to him and his family, and he is completely ignorant of this matter. If the dreamer sees the snake in his sleep and kills it, this means that he He overcame many obstacles that prevented him from achieving his goals and he will be very comfortable after that. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about a snake indicates the presence of many disorders that he suffers from in many aspects of his life, which makes him feel uncomfortable in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Shaheeninterprets The dreamer Ibn Shaheen who sees a snake in a dream is a sign of the many problems that he suffers from because he does not feel comfortable in his life. If one sees a large snake in his dream, this is a sign that all his enemies have gathered and agreed against him and he should beware that they are planning something very bad for him. Him. If the dreamer sees a snake in his dream, this indicates that there is a person intentionally placing obstacles in his way to prevent him from achieving his goals. The dreamer seeing in a dream a snake spraying its poison indicates the many fears that surround him and that greatly disturb his life. Interpretation of a dream About a snake for Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi interprets the dreamer’s vision of a snake in a dream as an indication of the many disagreements he is experiencing during this period with those close to him. If a person sees a snake in his dream, this is evidence of the presence of a person who holds a deep grudge against him, even though he shows friendliness in front of him. In the event that If the dreamer watches the snake during his sleep and manages to make it disappear, this indicates that he has overcome many of the problems he faced and will feel more comfortable after that. The dreamer who sees a snake biting him in his dream shows the loss of many of the blessings that he enjoyed in his life because he did not take care of In his life. What is the interpretation of a snake in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a single woman: It says that she is going through a very bad psychological state due to the many problems she suffers from in her life. If the dreamer sees a snake during his sleep, this indicates and

title: Interpretation of a dream about catching birds by hand

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about catching birds with one’s hand Dream and vision interpretation scholars say that there are two types of dreams, the first type includes real events that foretell goodness and herald joy and happiness, and this is considered one of the real dreams, while the second type has ambiguous connotations that are not understood and involve dream problems that have an influence from the subconscious. Seeing a bird catching by hand in a dream means that the dreamer has a strong personality and will succeed in practical life. Seeing catching birds in a dream is interpreted as the dreamer’s desire to start a family and may get married soon. Seeing birds in a dream and eating worms means that the dreamer will hear news. Sad during the coming period. Seeing catching birds in a dream is a sign of abundant sustenance and blessings in this world. Interpretation of a dream about catching birds by hand for a divorced woman. A dream in which she holds birds in her hand in a divorced woman’s dream means that she is trying to withstand all obstacles, but there are people who seek to destroy her life, However, you will be able to create an independent life. Seeing a divorced woman holding white birds in her hand in a dream means that she will hear happy news about her professional life, where she may receive a promotion or reward. Seeing catching colorful birds in a divorced woman’s dream is interpreted as having good qualities. You will receive abundant sustenance and blessings with money, God willing. Seeing catching birds in a dream for a divorced woman who was in a state of sadness indicates that she is going through a problem related to her marriage and must be content with God’s will, because what is coming will bring her goodness. Interpretation of a dream about catching birds by hand for single women. Interpretations of dreams and dreams vary. From one person to another, the dream of catching birds in the hand of a single woman is one of the reassuring dreams. Seeing catching birds by hand in the dream of an unmarried woman shows the girl’s desire for freedom and independence in her life away from her family, and this is evident through the signs of the dream. Seeing catching birds in a dream means that The girl will hear happy news during the coming period. Seeing holding birds in your hand in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the girl is seeking success and achieving many goals and dreams, and the dream has signs of achieving her goals. Seeing an unmarried girl holding birds indicates that she is in a state of Happiness will create a happy home with a husband who loves and loves her. To dream that you are holding birds in your hand in a dream for girls means that a single woman will enjoy goodness and happiness in this world. Dreaming of catching birds in a girl’s hand indicates that she has good morals and good qualities and will get what she seeks. Interpretation of a dream about catching birds by hand for a pregnant woman. Seeing holding birds by hand in a dream is interpreted for a pregnant woman, because she desires to have males, and the dream for him is a sign that a child will be born, God willing. Seeing catching birds in a pregnant woman’s dream is interpreted as worry about Childbirth, and this is reflected in the dream, and despite that, it will pass safely and be in health and safety. Seeing birds catching in a dream means that the pregnant woman seeks to have a baby.

title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold could be a vision of stealing gold in a dream. It is annoying and the dreamers see it as a bad sign, but the interpretation of the dream is another matter, and the dream of stealing money or gold has different meanings depending on the situation and circumstances of the dreamer and the dreamer. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of stealing gold. Interpretation of a dream of stealing gold. The scholar Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of a dream of stealing: Ibn Sirin shows that stealing money in a dream is a sign of illness and illness. If the dreamer sees in a dream someone stealing money from his home and failing to arrest him, it may indicate This leads to the death of one of his family members. If the thief in the dream is the owner of gold, this indicates that he is the one seeking promotion and a higher position. Interpretation of dreams of stealing money from a married woman. If a married woman sees how money is stolen in a dream, the interpretation is as follows. If a married woman sees She herself steals gold from a golden vault, as this indicates her ability to achieve her goals, desires, and dreams. A married woman dreams that she steals gold, jewelry, and money from her neighbor while she is happy, and this appears to her in a dream and indicates that she hears good news that makes her happy. If she unfortunately dreams of a way to steal Money from a married woman, it means that she will get pregnant soon and she will be happy with this pregnancy. If a man appears in a dream and steals a married woman’s money in a very sad moment, this is evidence of her salvation from all the problems and crises that she suffers from in life. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold for a single woman. Interpretations of a dream about stealing money for single women in dreams include the following: A single woman saw money in a dream and someone stole it, and the money was hers. She knew who the thief was and she was sad in the dream, very excited and afraid, and this indicates her salvation from sadness, death, worries, concerns, and problems that she faces in her life. If she discovers in a dream that a gold bracelet has been stolen from her, this indicates imminent satisfaction and good status. When a single woman steals money From her neighbor, this dream is evidence that she is fulfilling her dreams, desires, and what she wants in her entire life. She seems happy and cheerful because a lonely woman dreams of stealing a gold chain for her friends. It seems that she hears the good news and is happy about it. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Why do you dream of stealing and recovering? The interpretation of dreams of stealing gold and returning it is represented by the following interpretation: This dream explains the material problems of the dreamers and their desire to escape from them. If the dreamer sees someone stealing money from him, but He can catch up with him and return the money, as this is what he has a strong will to achieve, as his goal means that he has many talents and skills that must be facilitated. Interpretation of dreams of stealing money and money Ibn Sirin explains that seeing money and stealing gold in a dream is a sign of food, blessing and future prosperity in the dreamer’s life, in addition To the following interpretation of this dream. If you see a dreamer stealing gold and money in a dream, then this vision indicates that he will start a profitable deal that will bring a lot of money. Stealing money indicates

title: Interpretation of money in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: The interpretation of money in a dream for a single woman is one of the most common dreams that people see daily and is often asked on dream interpretation sites. Money and its type. There is a difference between paper money and coins, and gold coins have a difference in interpretation from silver coins. Therefore, in our article today we will discuss in detail the interpretation of the dream of paper money for single people by Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen through the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of money in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of money in a dream By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that whoever dreams that he is holding a paper in his hand, the owner of the male child will come, God willing. If the fortuneteller finds a box with many banknotes, this is an indication of the inheritance that he will inherit from someone close to him, on the condition that it enters his house in the dream. If it contains The box is on a bank note worth 5 pounds, 5 dinars, or dirhams. It indicates the dreamer’s lack of presence in his prayers with God, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the dreamer saw himself and was able to throw money into the street through the window, this is a sign of the collapse of obstacles, problems, and fears in life. The dreamer. If the fortuneteller pays a lot of money, this is a sign that the fortuneteller has eaten someone’s money and he must return it and repent to God. If the dreamer dreams that someone has given him a lot of paper money, then this is evidence of the abundance of food and abundant money that is on its way to the dreamer. God willing. Interpretation of money in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen believes that losing money in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from many problems. But if we see the loss of a banknote in a dream, it is one of the unwanted dreams, because it indicates the death or loss of one of the dreamer’s children. And God is Most High. But if the dreamer saw in the dream that he was stealing money, this indicates the loss of the dreamer’s money, or the loss of his money, or the dreamer’s distress and lack of money in real life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the fortuneteller throws money from the balcony on the condition that it be At home, this indicates relief from anxiety, salvation from worries and problems, and getting rid of them. Interpretation of money in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone is giving her money, this indicates her future marriage, the abundance of money or gold, or a large expense on the way to her. In the case of an unmarried girl who saw titles in her dream, it was a sign of the abundance of sustenance, dreams, and ambitions that the dreamer seeks to achieve. If the girl sees in her dream that she has lost money, this is an indication that there is an opportunity in her life, but she will lose it. As for who He saw someone giving her money, then this is evidence of marriage and a relationship with someone she knows or the existence of a benefit behind that person. As for seeing coins in an unmarried woman’s dream, this was evidence of many obstacles and problems that she will face in her life. As for seeing large amounts of money On the street in one dream, it was a sign of her close marriage to a wealthy person, or if

title: Wearing gold in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: There are many interpretations related to this type of vision, often a promising vision, and some of them are bad and repulsive, and this is what we will refer to in our article, and to learn more interpretations, follow our translator. Interpretation of seeing wearing gold in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl who sees gold in her dream indicates good news that will be announced soon. It often explains that a good man will propose to her and she will live a stable and happy life with him. If there is a young man who intends to marry her but does not propose At an official request, he was seen wearing a golden crown. This is evidence of the sincerity of his intention with her and her engagement. Wearing a golden crown is usually interpreted as a successful marriage project. Either she is engaged, and God will complement her well, or there is a fiancée who will propose to her, and He will do her good. If the girl sees in her dream She is wearing gold. This is an indication of an unpleasant vision and Ibn Sirin interpreted it as limits. This means that she will marry someone who hinders her freedom or severely restricts her. It can also be interpreted as feelings of anxiety and tension that she may be suffering from. If he is close to marriageable age or is studying In school or university, dreaming of wearing gold. This is a sign of success in her studies, work, or success in marriage. It can be said that the owner of this dream is very lucky. See also: Interpretation of a dream of wearing a gold ring for a married woman and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing wearing gold in a dream for a woman Married Woman: Wearing gold in a dream for a married woman can be interpreted as a good dream. Abundant food compensates her for her patience with what she has suffered in recent years. It solves all her problems, pays off her debts, and achieves all her ambitions and desires. The visionary is usually a combative and persistent personality who always strives to achieve her goals. If he has Females of marriageable age, this indicates the approaching date of one of them’s marriage. Or she could marry a relative of hers, such as her nieces or cousins. If she has male children, her features also seem to express feelings of joy and happiness by wearing gold. This is a sign that her children They will be healthy. If she expresses feelings of anxiety when wearing them, this indicates some problems that her children will face in the coming period. Rings and bracelets are usually associated with married life and spouses. Some of these visions are good and others are unpleasant, but they can be considered an indicator that you should pay attention to. As for a woman who has not given birth yet, she can announce this vision, and soon she will become pregnant, God willing. If the gold is a gift from someone, this indicates that you will obtain a lot of money and wealth that you will enjoy in the coming period. But in the event that the gift is from the husband Specifically, this can be interpreted as the fact that her husband respects her. His heart is attached to her and they live a calm and stable life. Some scholars interpreted the acquisition of gold by a small child, so the mother took it with pleasure. This is an indication that she will soon become pregnant or will give birth to a healthy pregnancy if she is pregnant. Interpretation of the vision of wearing gold In a man’s dream and its meaning: A man’s dream of gold in a dream is not a dream worthy of praise except for women. Unless...

title: Interpretation of seeing a broken mobile phone in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a broken mobile phone in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the mobile phone has become one of the necessities of life that no one can ignore during the day. Such as breaking a phone, breaking it, or blowing up its owner’s hands. In this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a broken phone in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a broken mobile phone in a dream. A broken phone in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will lose some of his money or will not be able to Of achieving the things he wants and strives for. If the dreamer is married, then this dream indicates the presence of problems in his marital and family life. This vision also shows that the dreamer is exposed to social and psychological problems. Whoever sees in his dream that his cell phone is broken, then his dream shows that he will break off his relationship With someone close to him in his life. This vision may indicate that the dreamer is going through a major crisis and will not find anyone to help him from his family and relatives. If someone dreams that his phone fell and broke, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will lose something dear to him. A dream about a mobile phone falling and breaking, The dreamer's attempt to fix it and his failure is an indication that the dreamer will face a crisis in something related to his life, and the dream here is a message to try to solve it. this is the problem. A problem before he regrets what he himself lost. If a person sees in his dream that he is looking at his broken phone, then this dream warns him of hearing unpleasant news related to his life, both professionally and socially. The phone falling from the dreamer’s hands and crashing in the dream indicates that he will suffer A loss in his business if he is a trader. A dream about a broken cell phone indicates that the dreamer has lost relationships with people close to him, who may be friends or colleagues. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cracked mobile screen in a dream. An unpleasant interpretation is a dream that the phone fell and its screen broke, and this means that the dreamer He will receive news that bothers him, but without harming him. This vision also indicates that the dreamer is dealing with any stressful issue. Dreaming of a broken phone screen in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face problems in the coming period. If one sees in his dream that his mobile phone screen is cracked And that he is not interested in what happened, this vision shows that he is not interested in small matters and that he is only interested in worthwhile matters. Whoever sees in a dream that his phone screen is cracked and is afraid or angry about what happened, his vision has shown that the owner of the vision takes everything seriously, no matter what. He is young and does not deserve this thing. A promising vision is to dream that the phone screen is broken and the viewer repairs it or gets a new phone. This means that the viewer’s circumstances will soon change for the better. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mobile phone breaking in a dream for a single woman. If a single woman sees in her dream that her phone is broken, then her dream indicates that she will face psychological or health problems. This vision may indicate that the dreamer may marry a person He lives in another country. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a broken cell phone for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that her cell phone is broken, then the dream indicates that her life will change to

Interpretation of a dream that I traveled to Brazil in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I traveled to Brazil in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of her vision, but travel can indicate moving from one place to another, and God knows best. If a married man sees travel, it may be travel, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees it, the trip may indicate good changes, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating in front of the sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Eating in front of the sea in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing food in the sea in a dream may indicate that a person eats what he desires without seeing what is forbidden or permissible, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman eating in the sea, perhaps she shows lack of attention. Interest in what is permissible or forbidden, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself eating in the sea, it may symbolize that he is eating whatever he desires, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about traveling with celebrities in a dream. Desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a young man sees a passport, it can lead to freedom from troubles, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake at home

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the houseInterpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house Seeing a black snake in a dream symbolizes something important. Although the meaning may vary, it may represent the death of someone close to you or a recent accident. Killing the snake, fighting it, or talking to it. What matters to us is explaining all the other signs. You can follow the article on the interpretation of the dream about a black snake in the house through variousInterpretation of a dream about a snake in the houseIbn Sirin sees the snake as a symbol of complicity in doing evil and evil. The snake is also a symbol of temptation and temptation. And this dream is the curse of Satan, because he is the one who tempted Adam and Eve to do what God forbade, by forbidding the tree and eating from it. If you see a snake in your dream, beware of your enemies. They are very dangerous and will most likely try to kill you. If you find yourself fighting this type of snake, this means that you are in a life battle or conflict. Interpretation of a dream about having sex with a known person for a married woman If a woman dreams of seeing a black snake in her house, this means that she will go through difficult times and lose her property. If she sees this vision, this means that positive thoughts have turned into negative thoughts. You will respond with negative comments to everything you hear and see. Also, seeing a black snake in his home expresses the dangers that threaten him in one way or another, and these threats are so close to him that it is impossible for him to understand them. The one who causes her psychological and moral harm is someone close to her who knows every step she takes morning and evening. Seeing a black snake in your home indicates the negative energy exchanged between it and the space in which it is located. Negative charges can flow from the inside to the outside or vice versa from the outside to the inside. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in a woman's house Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house Seeing a black snake means that you are likely to meet an angry and out-of-control woman. This vision can indicate two things. The first is that this woman has a vision, so she had to distance herself from these shameful acts that she is doing and commit to leaving the previous life in which she committed many lies. The second commandment: That the woman is a certain figure in the life of a married woman who seeks to harm her and spoil her relationship with her husband in any way, and she may also tend to steal her husband from her, and the purpose of all this is: Make the visionary live in a state of marital poverty. If a woman sees a black snake in her house, this means that she and her husband have different opinions about the simplest things, which leads to chaos and problems. Read also Interpretation of seeing a corpse wrapped in white in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house for a pregnant woman Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house The black snake in the dream represents the desire to overcome the current situation and the inner need to close one's eyes and wake up to the sound of the newborn. This vision reveals that you will face some difficulties during pregnancy, and childbirth will be painful - but the process will be smooth. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake biting me Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in the house

title: Interpretation of a white snake in a dream and seeing a white snake in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a white snake is evidence of salvation from magic, envy and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as seeing a white snake chasing me or a white snake chasing me, killing a white snake, escaping from white snakes and a white snake bite by Ibn Sirin, and more in the appendix article: Interpretation of a white snake in a dream Seeing a white snake in a dream is a symbol of knowledge, healing, female intrigues or hostility and more White snakes in a dream indicate betrayal, treachery and hatred by relatives and family Many white snakes appear in a dream as a partner's cunning, spiteful neighbor and evil person The white snake in a dream is good, and evidence of the patient's recovery and the return of the visitor. It is also a sign of the prisoner's relief. The white snake is also a symbol of success and seeing it in a dream is a sign of optimism and joy, which prompted Ibn Sirin to consider it a sign of good luck. The white snake, whoever sees it in a dream will attain a high position, and whoever sees it in his house is a weak enemy, and if he sees it in his pocket, it is money on the way, God willing. One. Anyone who sees a peaceful white snake in a dream and it has no poison, it means that you will get a treasure of gold or silver. Owning a white snake in a dream indicates wealth after poverty. The bite of a white snake in a dream indicates loss, but the loss, which is the loss of money according to the bite, means that if the bite is weak, the loss of money is small, and if the bite is large, the loss of money will be greater. Seeing talking to a white snake in a dream shows that people love you and will be impressed by the way you speak and the way you think. If you see a dead white snake in a dream, it indicates a weak enemy, God Almighty, to stop his evil. And the small white snake in a dream indicates excellence in business or profit in trade. Catching a white snake in a dream by hand means that the seer will be safe from what he fears. Whoever sees a white snake on the bed in a dream and he was killed or died and with great regret, this is a very bad sign and indicates the death of his life partner and with great regret. Interpretation of the dream of the white snake by Imam al-Sadiq Interpreters unanimously agree that the appearance of a snake in The dream is nothing but an enemy or a woman or the loss of a loved one, but Imam al-Sadiq also has a belief in the interpretation of dreams, as he interprets his dream. A snake according to its color in which it appeared in the dream. Here, Imam al-Sadiq interprets it and describes it as the presence of a woman of bad character and must be kept away from her, and the interpretation differs in the appearance of the white snake. Or it is interpreted in another way, which is that it is illness, weakness and misery, or a symbol of success, victory and good luck for the dreamer. Seeing a white snake in a dream for Ibn Sirin The meaning of seeing a white snake in a dream is evidence of the disappearance of anxiety and anxiety for the dreamer and the arrival of happy news, especially if the vision does not contain fear of the snake. Seeing a number of snakes or snakes and destroying them in a dream indicates
